verses.name: Revelation 17:9
verses.text: And here is the mind which hath wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sitteth.

verses.name: Revelation 17:10
verses.text: And there are seven kings: five are fallen, and one is, and the other is not yet come; and when he cometh, he must continue a short space.

verses.name: Revelation 17:11
verses.text: And the beast that was, and is not, even he is the eighth, and is of the seven, and goeth into perdition.

verses.name: Revelation 17:12
verses.text: And the ten horns which thou sawest are ten kings, which have received no kingdom as yet; but receive power as kings one hour with the beast.
